  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class PwsIntroPlugin
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.micromanager.IntroPlugin
    Simply changes the image shown when the software starts up.

        Description copied from interface: org.micromanager.IntroPlugin
        Provide a list of paths to config files to include in the config file dropdown menu. These will be provided in addition to any config files the user has used in the past. This list may be null or empty.
